original_text: And every day he was teaching in the temple, but at night he went out and lodged on the mount called Olivet.
korean_text: 예수께서 낮에는 성전에서 가르치시고 밤에는 나가 감람원이라 하는 산에서 쉬시니

sentences.original_text: And every day he was teaching in the temple
but at night he went out
and lodged on the mount called Olivet.
